query.title: Query
query.description: Sumo Logic query string for the search job. You need to escape special characters.

from_time.title: From Time
from_time.description: UTC date and time in the format 2017-01-25T00:00:00. Any data before this date will not be replicated. Leave empty if you want to pull from the very start.

to_time.title: To Time
to_time.description: UTC date and time in the format 2017-01-25T00:00:00. Any data after this date will not be replicated. Leave empty if you want to pull util the latest.

by_receipt_time.title: By Receipt Time
by_receipt_time.description: Query logs by _receipttime instead of _messagetime, default is using _messagetime.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: This row size limit used for pagination. Higher value requires more memory.

offset.title: Offset
offset.description: Skip the first N messages. Default 0
